caption: We love to go out. Yesterday we went to this superb restaurant which friends told us about. We enjoyed a beautiful evening there with fine meal and a nice team and a great  chef. We  added this fine restaurant in our list  and we shall definitely come back soon. We deeply recommend.
The place is great but if you don't speak Spanish, take someone who does with you. They speak very little english
I visit this place a lot since I work nearby. I like how the customer service is always excellent and they keep the spot clean regularly. Pricing is convenient and they serve large portions.
It was supposed to be open on a normal Monday night but it was closed without prior notice. Lost my time.

We arrived at this place for lunch. we heard about this place from many people.  Well, it was a winning. The crew were very polite and we felt fantastic. The food was just great. We loved this place very much and we will definitely return to this restaurant. we highly recommend this place.
Food was really good, Good service, nice environment, good sushi. When we were ordering dessert they only had half of what the menu actually said. Other than that it was good

(Translated by Google) The best Japanese fusion Latin food, do not forget to try a rich menu with a menu of different contrast of exquisite flavors and good family attention, I recommend Daniela roll and Avorza roll, for the meat I recommend the Kaitsu barbecue easy to share 2 people, for me it is the best sushi restaurant in Miami  (Original) La mejor comida japonesa fusión latina,no dejen de probar un rico menú con una carta de diferentes contraste de sabores exquisitos y una buena atención familiar,les recomiendo el Daniela roll y el Avorza roll,por las carnes le recomiendo la parrillada Kaitsu fácil para compartir 2 personas,para mi es el mejor restaurant de sushi dé Miami

The place is so cozy, clean... and the food is delicious. Reasonable prices, and the owners are incredible human beings. I’m a follower of Kai Tsu since they came to Miami with their exquisite Japanese cuisine.
